main event: On 30 July 1952, several unidentified flying objects were observed over Patrick AFB, Florida, displaying unusual flight characteristics.
interesting points: The flying objects approached the base at high speed before halting and reversing direction with no apparent turn,Five personnel, including aircraft maintenance staff and a control tower operator, witnessed the same objects,Objects appeared amber in color resembling large stars, A fourth object was tracked at high altitudes but displayed no means of propulsion, The sightings were made under unlimited sky conditions with no concurrent aircraft operations reported.
witness description: aircraft maintenance personnel and officers on duty
